001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
004import com.google.common.io.ByteStreams;
005import edu.pdx.cs410J.ParserException;
006import org.slf4j.Logger;
007import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
008
009import java.io.*;
010import java.time.LocalDateTime;
011import java.util.*;
012import java.util.jar.Attributes;
013import java.util.regex.Matcher;
014import java.util.regex.Pattern;
015import java.util.stream.Stream;
016import java.util.zip.ZipEntry;
017import java.util.zip.ZipInputStream;
018
019public class AndroidZipFixer {
020
021  private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger("edu.pdx.cs410J.grader");
022
023  private final GradeBook gradeBook;
024
025  @VisibleForTesting
026  AndroidZipFixer(GradeBook book) {
027    this.gradeBook = book;
028  }
029
030  public static void main(String[] args) {
031    String gradeBookFileName = null;
032    String outputDirectoryName = null;
033    List<String> zipFileNames = new ArrayList<>();
034
035    for (String arg : args) {
036      if (gradeBookFileName == null) {
037        gradeBookFileName = arg;
038
039      } else if (outputDirectoryName == null) {
040        outputDirectoryName = arg;
041
042      } else {
043        zipFileNames.add(arg);
044      }
045    }
046
047    if (gradeBookFileName == null) {
048      usage("Missing grade book file name");
049      return;
050    }
051
052    if (outputDirectoryName == null) {
053      usage("Missing output directory");
054      return;
055    }
056
057    if (zipFileNames.isEmpty()) {
058      usage("Missing zip file");
059      return;
060    }
061
062    File outputDirectory = new File(outputDirectoryName);
063    GradeBook book;
064    try {
065      XmlGradeBookParser parser = new XmlGradeBookParser(gradeBookFileName);
066      book = parser.parse();
067
068    } catch (IOException | ParserException ex) {
069      exitWithExceptionMessage("While parsing grade book", ex);
070      return;
071    }
072    AndroidZipFixer fixer = new AndroidZipFixer(book);
073
074    for (String zipFileName : zipFileNames) {
075      File zipFile = new File(zipFileName);
076      try {
077        fixer.fixZipFile(zipFile, outputDirectory);
078
079      } catch (IOException e) {
080        exitWithExceptionMessage("While fixing zip file " + zipFile, e);
081      }
082
083    }
084  }
085
086  private static void exitWithExceptionMessage(String message, Exception ex) {
087    System.err.println("+++ " + message);
088    System.err.println(ex.getMessage());
089
090    logger.debug(message, ex);
091
092    System.exit(1);
093  }
094
095  private void fixZipFile(File zipFile, File outputDirectory) throws IOException {
096    File fixedZipFile = getFixedZipFile(zipFile, outputDirectory);
097    String studentId = getStudentIdFromZipFileName(zipFile);
098    FileOutputStream fixZipStream = new FileOutputStream(fixedZipFile);
099
100    InputStream zipStream = new FileInputStream(zipFile);
101
102    HashMap<Attributes.Name, String> manifestEntries = getManifestEntriesForStudent(studentId);
103    fixZipFile(zipStream, fixZipStream, manifestEntries);
104  }
105
106  @VisibleForTesting
107  void fixZipFile(InputStream zipStream, OutputStream fixedZipStream, HashMap<Attributes.Name, String> manifestEntries) throws IOException {
108    ZipFileMaker maker = new ZipFileMaker(fixedZipStream, manifestEntries);
109    try (
110      ZipInputStream input = new ZipInputStream(zipStream)
111    ) {
112      Map<ZipEntry, InputStream> zipFileEntries = new HashMap<>();
113
114      for (ZipEntry entry = input.getNextEntry(); entry != null; entry = input.getNextEntry()) {
115        String entryName = entry.getName();
116        String fixedEntryName = getFixedEntryName(entryName);
117
118        if (fixedEntryName != null) {
119          logger.debug(entryName + " fixed to " + fixedEntryName);
120
121          ZipEntry fixedEntry = new ZipEntry(fixedEntryName);
122          fixedEntry.setLastModifiedTime(entry.getLastModifiedTime());
123          fixedEntry.setMethod(ZipEntry.DEFLATED);
124
125          byte[] entryBytes = ByteStreams.toByteArray(input);
126          zipFileEntries.put(fixedEntry, new ByteArrayInputStream(entryBytes));
127
128        } else {
129          logger.debug(entryName + " ignored");
130        }
131      }
132
133      maker.makeZipFile(zipFileEntries);
134    }
135  }
136
137  private String getStudentIdFromZipFileName(File zipFile) {
138    String fileName = zipFile.getName();
139    int index = fileName.indexOf(".zip");
140    if (index < 0) {
141      return fileName;
142
143    } else {
144      return fileName.substring(0, index);
145    }
146  }
147
148  @VisibleForTesting
149  HashMap<Attributes.Name, String> getManifestEntriesForStudent(String studentId) {
150    Student student =
151      this.gradeBook.getStudent(studentId).orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown student: " + studentId));
152
153    HashMap<Attributes.Name, String> manifest = new HashMap<>();
154    manifest.put(Submit.ManifestAttributes.USER_ID, student.getId());
155    manifest.put(Submit.ManifestAttributes.USER_NAME, student.getFullName());
156
157    LocalDateTime submissionTime = getSubmissionTime(student);
158    if (submissionTime != null) {
159      manifest.put(Submit.ManifestAttributes.SUBMISSION_TIME, Submit.ManifestAttributes.formatSubmissionTime(submissionTime));
160    }
161
162    return manifest;
163  }
164
165  private LocalDateTime getSubmissionTime(Student student) {
166    Grade project = student.getGrade("Project5");
167    if (project == null) {
168      logger.warn("No Project5 submission for " + student.getId());
169      return null;
170    }
171
172    return project.getSubmissionTimes().stream().max(Comparator.naturalOrder()).orElse(null);
173  }
174
175  @VisibleForTesting
176  static String getFixedEntryName(String entryName) {
177    Stream<String> ignore = Stream.of("__MACOSX", "/test", "/androidTest", "/build/", ".DS_Store", "gradlew.bat");
178    if (ignore.anyMatch(entryName::contains)) {
179      return null;
180    }
181
182    List<String> moveToTopLevel =
183      List.of("app/build.gradle", "build.gradle", "gradle.properties", "gradlew", "settings.gradle" );
184    for (String special : moveToTopLevel) {
185      if (entryName.contains(special)) {
186        return special;
187      }
188    }
189
190    if (entryName.endsWith("gradle")) {
191      return "gradle";
192    }
193
194    String fixedName = replaceRegexWithPrefix(entryName, ".*/src/main/(.*)", "app/src/main/");
195
196    if (fixedName == null) {
197      fixedName = replaceRegexWithPrefix(entryName, ".*/main/(.*)", "app/src/main/");
198    }
199
200    if (fixedName == null) {
201      fixedName = replaceRegexWithPrefix(entryName, ".*/java/(.*)", "app/src/main/java/");
202    }
203
204    if (fixedName == null) {
205      fixedName = replaceRegexWithPrefix(entryName, "^edu/(.*)", "app/src/main/java/edu/");
206    }
207
208    if (fixedName == null) {
209      fixedName = replaceRegexWithPrefix(entryName, ".*/gradle/(.*)", "gradle/");
210    }
211
212    return fixedName;
213  }
214
215  private static String replaceRegexWithPrefix(String entryName, String regex, String replaceWithPrefix) {
216    Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile(regex);
217    Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(entryName);
218
219    if (matcher.matches()) {
220      String portionUnderMain = matcher.group(1);
221      if ("".equals(portionUnderMain)) {
222        return null;
223
224      } else {
225        return replaceWithPrefix + portionUnderMain;
226      }
227
228    } else {
229      return null;
230    }
231  }
232
233  private static File getFixedZipFile(File zipFile, File outputDirectory) {
234    return new File(outputDirectory, zipFile.getName());
235  }
236
237  private static void usage(String message) {
238    PrintStream err = System.err;
239
240    err.println("+++ " + message);
241    err.println();
242    err.println("usage: java GwtZipFixer gradeBook outputDirectory zipFile+");
243    err.println("    gradeBook           Grade book XML file");
244    err.println("    outputDirectory     Name of direct into which fixed zip files should be written");
245    err.println("    zipFile             Name of zip file to be fixed");
246    err.println();
247    err.println("Fixes the contents of a zip file submitted for the GWT ");
248    err.println("project so that it will work with the grading scripts");
249    err.println();
250
251    System.exit(1);
252  }
253}
